About

Frontend developer focused on thoughtful architecture and delightful experiences.

Driven and creative Frontend Developer with nearly three years of commercial experience building real estate SPAs, e-commerce widgets, and cross-platform mobile apps.

I collaborate closely with backend engineers, designers, and QA to deliver clean, efficient solutions that elevate user experience and product quality. Passionate about learning, exploring new tooling, and contributing to team growth.

Warsaw, Poland · collaborating remotely
English (Upper-Intermediate)

Currently

Frontend Developer · Frontco

Partner with a multidisciplinary team to develop Nuxt 3 and Vue applications, integrate APIs, and drive performance improvements.

Focus

Nuxt 3, Vue 3, TypeScript, SSR, API integration

Availability

Jan 2022 – Oct 2025 · open to new opportunities

My journey

Past roles have spanned frontend engineering, interface design, and mentoring cross-functional teams. I love pairing with designers and backend engineers to create cohesive experiences.

Frontend Developer · Frontco

Jan 2022 — Oct 2025

Developed Nuxt and Vue web apps, implemented SSR, and optimized rendering to boost SEO and performance within a cross-functional squad of five.

Implemented SSR & dynamic routing with vue-routerDelivered API integrations and component optimizations (−30% load time)Collaborated with frontend, backend, design, and QA teammates

Values I bring

Clean, maintainable code

Obsessed with structure, readability, and long-term maintainability to help teams move faster without friction.

Team-first collaboration

Partner closely with designers, backend engineers, and QA to ship cohesive experiences while sharing knowledge across the team.

Relentless learning

Invest in continuous growth through courses, technical communities, and side projects that sharpen product intuition and code quality.

Beyond the screen

Outside of work you’ll find me exploring typography, experimenting with motion design, or teaching mentees how to build accessible interfaces. These hobbies keep me curious and feed back into the creativity I bring to each project.

Continuous learning

Diving into courses, talks, and community resources to sharpen frontend craft and stay current.

Endurance & focus

Training for 10 km runs and martial arts tournaments to stay disciplined, resilient, and energized.
